org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa
Class ConfigurationAutomaton

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Automaton
          org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.FSA
              org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.ConfigurationAutomaton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Editable
public class ConfigurationAutomaton
extends FSA

This class defines a configuration automaton for another automaton A on an input sequence W. In this automaton, a state is a ConfigurationState that contains a configuration. Note that this configuration automaton has no acceptance condition.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form
